column4: well I am gonna call it a night .. dapper definitely screwed the pooch with wifi :D .. I hope they will have a patch soon :)
did u install xine?
do u have the link to the wiki?
http://ubuntuguide.org/wiki/Dapper
yup
I got it working on my 9700 .. no to 9200
make sure you rename the current one and not delete
well good night guys .. this was .. umm fun
Don_jr: ndiswrapper didn't do it for me .. I couldn't change my essid :(
letido: lucky you :)
what card do you have?
bcm43xx
outstanding!  that's the best series of cards ever.
except Dapper forgot to include the firmwire with it LOL :)
not dapper's fault, broadcom are jerks and won't give up the specs
absolutely agree
but we need better directions
I suggest you write to your NTFS :-p
sorry can't break what I don't have :)
I feel like my whole mind is ntfs right now  :\
I recomment cat /proc/troubles >> /dev/null then fsck world then emerge scotch --nodeps --nointterupt :)
